document_name: Law of finance 2013 relative to the deletion of customs charges on equipments and material of solar energy
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BFA/2013/BFA-2013-01-01-Law of finance 2013 relative to the deletion of customs charges on equipments and material of solar energy_f605f86182e4aa024bdee1ab30df2b95.pdf
document_description: The law no 051-2012/AN set sets the 2013 budget for Burkina Faso. Article 29 of this law exonerates solar equipments of customs and VAT taxes. The article lists the equipments concerned by the exoneration.
